00104         class SuccessAfter: public BehaviorTreeNode
00105         {
00106         public:
00107                 int n;
00108                 int total;
00109                 BEHAVIOR_STATUS execute(void* agent)
00110                 {
00111                         if (n == 0)
00112                         {
00113                                 return BT_SUCCESS;
00114                         }
00115                         else
00116                         {
00117                                 n--;
00118                                 return BT_RUNNING;
00119                         }
00120                 }
00121                 void init(void* agent)
00122                 {
00123                         n = total;
00124                 };
00125                 SuccessAfter::SuccessAfter(int t)
00126                 {
00127                         total = t;
00128                         n = total;
00129                 }
00130         };
